opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of June, 2011, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED. Further, OSI Outsourcing Solutions, Inc.’s Motion for Leave of Court to Supplement Respondent’s Answer to Petition for Allowance of Appeal of Petitioner, Pennsylvania Electric, Inc., is DENIED as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 7, 2011.
